trans-unit.source: (Note: 'scalar' here means values that can be compared directly using === . So: numbers, strings, objects by reference, functions by reference. See the MDN reference for more info about the comparison operators).
trans-unit.target: （注意：“标量”在这里表示可以使用 === 直接比较的值。因此：数字，字符串，按引用的对象，按引用的函数。有关比较运算符的更多信息，请参见MDN参考。）

I believe that larger amounts of data should be always stored in arrays, not in objects. However if you use objects, they can be partially compared too.
Here's how:

我认为，应将大量数据始终存储在数组中，而不是对象中。但是，如果使用对象，也可以部分比较它们。
就是这样：

trans-unit.source: A simple approach:
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的方法。

trans-unit.source: Already some great answers.But i would like to share anther idea which has proven to be reliable in comparing arrays. We can compare two array using JSON.stringify ( ) . It will create a string out the the array and thus compare two obtained strings from two array for equality
trans-unit.target: 已经有一些不错的答案了。但是我想分享另一种想法，该想法在比较数组中被证明是可靠的。我们可以使用JSON.stringify（）比较两个数组。它将在数组中创建一个字符串，从而比较从两个数组中获得的两个字符串是否相等

trans-unit.source: Another approach with very few code (using Array reduce and Array includes):
trans-unit.target: 很少代码的另一种方法（使用Array reduce和Array includes）：

trans-unit.source: Answering Dmitry Grinko's question: "Why did you use spread operator ( ... ) here - ...new Set ? It doesn't work"
trans-unit.target: 回答Dmitry Grinko的问题。"为什么你在这里使用 spread operator (...)-...new Set? 它不起作用"

trans-unit.source: Arbitrary comparison (example)
trans-unit.target: 任意比较(例子)

trans-unit.source: As the type suggests, arrayCompare takes comparison function, f, and two input arrays, xs and ys. For the most part, all we do is call f (x) (y) for each element in the input arrays. We return an early false if the user-defined f returns false – thanks to &&'s short-circuit evaluation. So yes, this means the comparator can stop iteration early and prevent looping through the rest of the input array when unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 正如类型所暗示的， arrayCompare 接受比较函数 f ，以及两个输入数组 xs 和 ys 。在大多数情况下，我们要做的就是为输入数组中的每个元素调用 f (x) (y) 。我们回到早期的 false ，如果用户定义的 f 回报 false -由于 && 的短路计算。所以是的，这意味着比较器可以及早停止迭代，并在不必要时防止循环遍历输入数组的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Because arrayDeepCompare is curried, we can partially apply it like we did in the previous examples too
trans-unit.target: 因为 arrayDeepCompare 是可固化的，所以我们也可以像前面的示例一样部分应用它

trans-unit.source: Bonus: Nested arrays with indexOf and contains
trans-unit.target: 奖励：具有 indexOf 且 contains 嵌套数组

trans-unit.source: Building off Tomáš Zato's answer, I agree that just iterating through the arrays is the fastest. Additionally (like others have already stated), the function should be called equals/equal, not compare. In light of this, I modified the function to handle comparing arrays for similarity - i.e. they have the same elements, but out of order - for personal use, and thought I'd throw it on here for everyone to see.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">基于TomášZato的回答，我同意仅迭代数组是最快的。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">另外（就像其他人已经说过的那样），该函数应称为等于/等于，而不是比较。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">有鉴于此，我修改了该函数以处理比较数组的相似性（即它们具有相同的元素，但顺序混乱）供个人使用，并认为我会将其放在这里供大家查看。</font></font>

It works in the general case, which JSON- and join()-based solutions will not:

trans-unit.source: I think it's wrong to say a particular implementation is "The Right Way™" if it's only "right" ("correct") in contrast to a "wrong" solution. Tomáš's solution is a clear improvement over string-based array comparison, but that doesn't mean it's objectively "right". What is right anyway? Is it the fastest? Is it the most flexible? Is it the easiest to comprehend? Is it the quickest to debug? Does it use the least operations? Does it have any side effects? No one solution can have the best of all the things.
trans-unit.target: 我认为，如果某个实现只是“正确的”（“正确的”），而不是“错误的”解决方案，那么说一个特定的实现就是“正确的方式”是错误的。 Tomáš的解决方案是对基于字符串的数组比较的明显改进，但这并不意味着它客观上是“正确的”。反正什么是对的？是最快的吗？最灵活吗？这是最容易理解的吗？调试最快吗？它使用最少的操作吗？有副作用吗？没有一种解决方案可以拥有所有优点。

trans-unit.source: I'd like to compare two arrays... ideally, efficiently. Nothing fancy, just true if they are identical, and false if not.
trans-unit.target: 我想比较两个数组...理想地，有效地比较。别无所求，如果相同则为true，否则为false。

trans-unit.source: I'd like to compare two arrays... ideally, efficiently. Nothing fancy, just true if they are identical, and false if not. Not surprisingly, the comparison operator doesn't seem to work.

trans-unit.source: In my opinion, the best kind of code doesn't even need comments, and this is no exception. There's so little happening here that you can understand the behaviour of this procedure with almost no effort at all. Sure, some of the ES6 syntax might seem foreign to you now, but that's only because ES6 is relatively new.
trans-unit.target: 在我看来,最好的代码甚至不需要注释,这也不例外。这里发生的事情太少了,以至于你几乎不费吹灰之力就能理解这个过程的行为。当然,有些ES6的语法可能现在对你来说似乎很陌生,但这只是因为ES6是相对较新的。

trans-unit.source: In the spirit of the original question:
trans-unit.target: 根据原问题的精神。

trans-unit.source: Is it the fastest? Nope. But it probably doesn't need to be either. If speed is the only metric used to measure the quality of our code, a lot of really great code would get thrown away — That's why I'm calling this approach The Practical Way. Or maybe to be more fair, A Practical Way. This description is suitable for this answer because I'm not saying this answer is only practical in comparison to some other answer; it is objectively true. We've attained a high degree of practicality with very little code that's very easy to reason about. No other code can say we haven't earned this description.
trans-unit.target: 是最快的吗？不。但这可能也不需要。如果速度是用来衡量代码质量的唯一指标，那么很多非常好的代码就会被扔掉-这就是为什么我将这种方法称为“实用方法”。或者更公平地说，一种实用的方法。此说明适用于此答案，因为我并不是说此答案仅与其他答案相比是实际的；客观上是正确的。我们已经以很少的代码（很容易推理）获得了高度的实用性。没有其他代码可以说我们还没有获得此描述。

trans-unit.source: It is not stated in the question how the structure of the array is going to look like, so If you know for sure that you won't have nested arrays nor objects in you array (it happened to me, that's why I came to this answer) the above code will work.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题没有说明，所以数组的结构看起来是什么样子，所以如果您确定您不会有嵌套的数组或数组中的对象，那么这就是我的原因，这就是为什么答案）以上代码将起作用。

trans-unit.source: Less is More
trans-unit.target: 少即是多

trans-unit.target: Lodash isEqual docs

trans-unit.source: My answer will approach the problem differently. I'll start with a generic arrayCompare procedure that is only concerned with stepping through the arrays. From there, we'll build our other basic comparison functions like arrayEqual and arrayDeepEqual, etc
trans-unit.target: 我的回答将以不同的方式处理该问题。我将从通用的 arrayCompare 过程开始，该过程仅涉及逐步遍历数组。从那里，我们将构建其他基本比较函数，例如 arrayEqual 和 arrayDeepEqual 等。

trans-unit.source: My old answer was more focused on decomposing arrayEqual into tiny procedures. It's an interesting exercise, but not really the best (most practical) way to approach this problem. If you're interested, you can see this revision history.
trans-unit.target: 我以前的答案是更专注于将 arrayEqual 分解为小程序。这是一个有趣的练习，但实际上并不是解决此问题的最佳（最实用）方法。如果您有兴趣，可以查看此修订历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Next, using our arrayCompare function, we can easily create other functions we might need. We'll start with the elementary arrayEqual …
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用 arrayCompare 函数，我们可以轻松创建可能需要的其他函数。我们将从基本 arrayEqual 开始……

trans-unit.source: Notice that we also define equal as it's own function. This highlights the role of arrayCompare as a higher-order function to utilize our first order comparator in the context of another data type (Array).
trans-unit.target: 注意，我们也将 equal 定义为自己的函数。这突出显示了 arrayCompare 作为高阶函数的作用，以便在另一种数据类型（Array）的上下文中利用我们的一阶比较器。

trans-unit.source: Now what if you have an array of objects or something ? Maybe you want to consider those arrays as "equal" if each object has the same id value …
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果您有一系列对象或东西呢？如果每个对象具有相同的 id 值，也许您想将这些数组视为“相等” …

trans-unit.source: Object comparison (example)
trans-unit.target: 物体比较(例)

trans-unit.source: On the same lines as JSON.encode is to use join().
trans-unit.target: 与JSON.encode相同的是使用join()。

trans-unit.source: Only problem is if you care about types which the last comparison tests. If you care about types, you will have to loop.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的问题是,如果你关心的是上次比较测试的类型。如果你关心的是类型,那么你就必须要循环。

trans-unit.source: Or what if you wanted to do some other kind of kind of completely arbitrary comparison ? Maybe I want to know if each x is greater than each y …
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您想进行其他某种完全任意的比较，该怎么办？也许我想知道每个 x 是否大于每个 y …

trans-unit.source: Please do note that you are no longer comparing the object but the string representation of the object. It may not be exactly what you want.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,你所比较的不再是对象,而是对象的字符串表示。它可能不是你想要的那样。

trans-unit.source: Rr, in ECMAScript 6 / CoffeeScript / TypeScript with Arrow Functions:
trans-unit.target: Rr,在ECMAScript 6 CoffeeScript TypeScript的箭头函数中。

trans-unit.source: Show code snippet
trans-unit.target: 显示代码片段

trans-unit.source: Simple as that. arrayEqual can be defined with arrayCompare and a comparator function that compares a to b using === (for strict equality).
trans-unit.target: 就那么简单。 arrayEqual 可以与被定义 arrayCompare 和进行比较的比较功能 a 至 b 使用 === （为全等）。

trans-unit.source: Simple as that. Here I've used vanilla JS objects, but this type of comparator could work for any object type; even your custom objects. Tomáš's solution would need to be completely reworked to support this kind of equality test
trans-unit.target: 就那么简单。在这里，我使用了普通的JS对象，但是这种类型的比较器可以适用于任何对象类型。甚至您的自定义对象。托马斯（Tomáš）的解决方案需要完全重新设计以支持这种平等测试

trans-unit.source: Simple as that. We build a deep comparator using another higher-order function. This time we're wrapping arrayCompare using a custom comparator that will check if a and b are arrays. If so, reapply arrayDeepCompare otherwise compare a and b to the user-specified comparator (f). This allows us to keep the deep comparison behavior separate from how we actually compare the individual elements. Ie, like the example above shows, we can deep compare using equal, looseEqual, or any other comparator we make.
trans-unit.target: 就那么简单。我们使用另一个高阶函数构建一个深度比较器。这次，我们使用自定义比较器包装 arrayCompare ，该比较器将检查 a 和 b 是否为数组。如果是这样，请重新应用 arrayDeepCompare ,否则将 a 和 b 与用户指定的比较器（ f ）进行比较。这使我们能够将深度比较行为与实际比较各个元素的方式分开。即，如上面的示例所示，我们可以使用 equal ， looseEqual 或我们创建的任何其他比较器进行深度比较。

trans-unit.source: Some test cases for mocha:
trans-unit.target: 摩卡的一些测试案例。

trans-unit.source: Strict comparison
trans-unit.target: 严格的比较

trans-unit.source: That's the difference, the former would give me a Set, it would work too as I could get the size of that Set, but the latter gives me the array I need, what's more direct to the resolution.
trans-unit.target: 这就是区别,前者会给我一个Set,它也可以,因为我可以得到那个Set的大小,但后者给了我需要的数组,什么是更直接的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The length check ensures that the set of elements in one array isn't just a subset of the other one.
trans-unit.target: 的 length 检查确保该组中一个阵列元件的不只是另一个的子集。

trans-unit.source: The Practical Way
trans-unit.target: 实用的方法

trans-unit.source: The reducer is used to walk through one array and search for each item in other array. If one item isn't found the reduce function returns false.
trans-unit.target: reducer用于遍历一个数组并搜索另一数组中的每个项目。如果未找到任何一项，则reduce函数将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The second example check for the order too
trans-unit.target: 第二个例子检查的顺序太

trans-unit.source: Then the above code would give true
trans-unit.target: 然后上面的代码将为 true

trans-unit.source: This I think is the simplest way to do it using JSON stringify, and it may be the best solution in some situations:
trans-unit.target: 我认为这是用JSON stringify最简单的方法,在某些情况下可能是最好的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: This answer also ignores the order of elements, as I said, the exact situation happened to me, so maybe someone in the same situation might end up here (as I did).
trans-unit.target: 正如我说的那样，这个答案也忽略了元素的顺序，就像我说的那样，确切的情况发生在我身上，因此也许处于相同情况的某个人可能会在这里结束（就像我一样）。

trans-unit.source: This compares 2 unsorted arrays:
trans-unit.target: 这比较了2个未排序的数组。

trans-unit.source: This converts the objects a1 and a2 into strings so they can be compared. The order is important in most cases, for that can sort the object using a sort algorithm shown in one of the above answers.
trans-unit.target: 这会将对象 a1 和 a2 转换为字符串，以便可以对其进行比较。在大多数情况下，顺序很重要，因为顺序可以使用上述答案之一所示的排序算法对对象进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This function takes an additional parameter of strict that defaults to true. This strict parameter defines if the arrays need to be wholly equal in both contents and the order of those contents, or simply just contain the same contents.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数需要一个额外的参数 strict,默认为 true。这个 strict 参数定义了数组的内容和顺序是否需要完全相等,或者仅仅是包含相同的内容。

trans-unit.source: This has a reason, since there may be, for example private variables within objects.
trans-unit.target: 这是有原因的，因为对象中可能存在例如私有变量。

trans-unit.source: This is how i did it.
trans-unit.target: 我就是这样做的

trans-unit.source: This should return true only if the arrays have equal elements at corresponding indices.
trans-unit.target: 只有当数组在相应的索引处有相等的元素时,才会返回true。

trans-unit.source: To compare arrays, loop through them and compare every value:
trans-unit.target: 为了比较数组,要在数组中进行循环,比较每一个值。

trans-unit.source: To make this work with Array.equals you must edit the original function a little bit:
trans-unit.target: 为了使它与 Array.equals 一起使用，您必须稍微编辑一下原始函数：

trans-unit.source: To me, this already a clear improvement over Tomáš's solution because I can explicitly choose a shallow or deep comparison for my arrays, as needed.
trans-unit.target: 对我来说，这已经是Tomáš解决方案的明显改进，因为我可以根据需要为数组明确选择浅表或深表比较。

trans-unit.source: Tomáš's could say his solution is fast but I would also say it is needlessly complicated. It tries to be an all-in-one solution that works for all arrays, nested or not. In fact, it even accepts more than just arrays as an input and still attempts to give a "valid" answer.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">汤玛斯（Tomáš）可以说他的解决方案是快速的，但我也要说它不必要地复杂。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">它试图成为一种适用于所有数组（无论是否嵌套）的多合一解决方案。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">实际上，它甚至接受的不仅仅是数组作为输入，而且仍然尝试给出“有效”答案。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Underscore isEqual docs
trans-unit.target: Underscore isEqual docs

trans-unit.source: Usage:
trans-unit.target: Usage:

trans-unit.source: We could do this the functional way, using every (https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/every)
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 every （https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/every）来通过功能性方式实现

trans-unit.source: We could just as easily defined arrayLooseEqual using a == instead. Now when comparing 1 (Number) to '1' (String), the result will be true …
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 == 来轻松定义 arrayLooseEqual 。现在，将 1 （数字）与 '1' （字符串）进行比较时，结果将为 true …

trans-unit.source: Well our arrayCompare procedure is versatile enough to use in a way that makes a deep equality test a breeze …
trans-unit.target: 好吧，我们的 arrayCompare 程序具有足够的通用性，可以轻松地进行深度相等测试……

trans-unit.source: What happens is that we use spread operator ( ... ) to concat both arrays, then we use Set to eliminate any duplicates. Once you have that you can compare their sizes, if all three arrays have the same size you are good to go.
trans-unit.target: 我们要做的事情是,我们用spread操作符(...)将两个数组的大小合并,然后用Set来消除任何重复的数组。一旦你有了这些,你就可以比较它们的大小,如果三个数组都有相同的大小,你就可以进行比较了。

trans-unit.source: While this only works for scalar arrays (see note below), it is short:
trans-unit.target: 虽然这只适用于标量数组(见下面的注释),但它很短。

trans-unit.source: With ease, we can define exactly how we wish for two arrays to be compared — shallow, deep, strict, loose, some object property, or some arbitrary computation, or any combination of these — all using one procedure, arrayCompare. Maybe even dream up a RegExp comparator ! I know how kids love those regexps …
trans-unit.target: 轻松，我们可以定义正是我们希望的要比较两个数组-浅，深，严，活，一些对象属性，或一些任意的计算，或者它们的任意组合- 所有使用一个程序， arrayCompare 。甚至可以梦想一个 RegExp 比较器！我知道孩子们如何爱那些正则表达式……

trans-unit.source: Works with MULTIPLE arguments with NESTED arrays:
trans-unit.target: 与NESTED数组一起使用MULTIPLE参数：

trans-unit.source: Works with any nested data structure, and obviously ignores objects' methods. Don't even think of extending Object.prototype with this method, when I tried this once, jQuery broke ;)
trans-unit.target: 可以与任何嵌套的数据结构一起使用,而且显然可以忽略对象的方法。别想用这个方法扩展Object.prototype,当我试过一次,jQuery就崩溃了;)

trans-unit.source: You can see we're actually doing more with less code. There's nothing complicated about arrayCompare itself and each of the custom comparators we've made have a very simple implementation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到我们实际上在用更少的代码做更多的事情。 arrayCompare 本身并不复杂，我们制作的每个自定义比较器都有一个非常简单的实现。

trans-unit.source: You may say "But it is much faster to compare strings - no loops..." well, then you should note there ARE loops. First recursive loop that converts Array to string and second, that compares two strings. So this method is faster than use of string.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会说“ 但是比较字符串要快得多-没有循环... ”，那么，您应该注意存在ARE循环。第一个递归循环将Array转换为字符串，第二个递归循环比较两个字符串。因此，此方法比使用string更快。

trans-unit.source: You'll get
trans-unit.target: 你会得到

trans-unit.source: You've probably noticed that this is only shallow comparison tho. Surely Tomáš's solution is "The Right Way™" because it does implicit deep comparison, right ?
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您可能已经注意到，这只是比较浅的比较。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Tomáš的解决方案肯定是“ The Right Way™”，因为它确实进行了隐式的深度比较，对吗？</font></font>

trans-unit.target: 调用函数

trans-unit.target: 希望能帮到某人。
